tig.descrip: "policy" was previously translated as "règle" (same as "rule"), however these translations should differ to avoid confusion. This is why, "policy" should be translated as "stratégie", and "rule" remains "règle".

tig.descrip: Do not translate edge computing. In French, depending on the context, you may precede it with "de type" so as to have "... de type « edge computing »"
